1581156 - ITS: XSS vulnerability on page generated by HTTP handler

```markdown
## SAP Security Note 1581156

**Title:** ITS: XSS vulnerability on page generated by HTTP handler  
**Type:** SAP Security Note  
**Release Date:** July 10, 2012  
**Language:** English  
**Priority:** Correction with high priority  
**Status:** Released for Customer  
**Component:** SAP Internet Transaction Server (BC-FES-ITS)

### Description

A **JavaScript Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)** vulnerability exists on the HTML page generated by the HTTP handler of the ITS services. This vulnerability affects the services of the NetWeaver integrated ITS that use the current version of the HTTP handler `CL_HTTP_EXT_ITS`. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary JavaScript code in the context of a user's browser, potentially leading to unauthorized actions or data disclosure.

### Affected Software Components

- **SAP_BASIS** versions:
  - 6.40
  - 7.00 to 7.02
  - 7.10 to 7.30

### Solution

To address this vulnerability, **import the most current Basis Support Package** for your NetWeaver system. You can download the necessary support packages using the links below:

- [Download for SNOTE](https://notesdownloads.sap.com/note/0040000009382542017)
- [PDF Version](https://userapps.support.sap.com/sap/support/sfm/notes/print/0001581156?language=en-US&token=8E6B7DB067E58822D2EDF0BA475EB6CF)

For support packages, visit the [Support Package Page](https://me.sap.com/supportpackage/SAPKB64028).

### Prerequisites

Ensure the following SAP Notes are implemented to maintain system integrity:

- [1521808](https://me.sap.com/notes/1521808) - ITS: Follow-up tasks for XSRF framework
- [1459135](https://me.sap.com/notes/1459135) - SAP GUI for HTML: URL OK code strings w/ over 200 characters
- [1465767](https://me.sap.com/notes/1465767) - Logon user exit SUSR0001 not called
- [1571684](https://me.sap.com/notes/1571684) - Protect against cross-site request forgery for ITS mobile Services
- [1702575](https://me.sap.com/notes/1702575) - SAP GUI for HTML: Connection closed immediately after start
- [1475285](https://me.sap.com/notes/1475285) - SAP GUI for HTML: Parameters such as ~nosplash are ignored
- [1552922](https://me.sap.com/notes/1552922) - SAP GUI for HTML: Minor corrections in the spring of 2011
- [1708362](https://me.sap.com/notes/1708362) - SAP GUI for HTML: Correction instructions for SAP Note 1571684
- [1410968](https://me.sap.com/notes/1410968) - SAP GUI for HTML: Security warning during HTTPS request

### Additional Information

- **Recency:** New
- **Category:** Program error
- **Master Language:** German
- **Available Languages:** Deutsch, 日本語, Português, Español, Français, Italiano, Русский, 中文, 한국어

### Credits

Thanks to [RedRays](https://redrays.io) for supporting the provision of this information.
```
